Coach.profile: Kohli captained India Under-19s to victory at the 2008 Under-19 World Cup in Malaysia, and a few months later, made his ODI debut for India against Sri Lanka at the age of 19.

coachAchievements.string: His interview from Bangkok for the Head Coach and his subsequent tiff with Sourav Ganguly made headlines, but after Anil Kumble's unceremonious exit after the 2017 Champions Trophy, he was back in the chair.
